mapper.select: select p.projectName,p.gitUrl,pr.runServerIp as serviceIp,pr.runProfileConfig from t_project p inner join t_project_profile pp on p.projectCode = pp.projectCode inner join t_profile_runprofile_relation pr on pr.profileCode = pp.profileCode where p.projectCode = #{projectCode}

select pr.runProfileConfig,pp.branchName from t_project_profile pp inner join t_project p on p.projectCode = pp.projectCode inner join t_profile_runprofile_relation pr on pp.profileCode = pr.profileCode where p.projectCode = #{projectCode}

select tgu.id,tgu.gitlabUserName,tgu.gitlabName,tgu.gitlabEmail from t_gitlab_user tgu inner join t_user_project tup on tgu.userId = tup.userId inner join t_project tp on tp.id = tup.projectId where tp.projectCode = #{projectCode}
